name: Phronesis
goal:
Phronesis is a newly established public affairs and communications consultancy, based in Brussels. Phronesis aims to provide our financial services clients with expert advice on all aspects of European legislation, particularly in relation to key files such as AIFMD, UCITS and the Securitisation Regulation.

Phronesis will be actively engaged with the European institutions in all areas of policy development and the regulatory framework for the financial services industry.
euInitiatives:
The main legislative files followed by Phronesis include:

Alternative Investment Fund Managers Directive
Sustainable finance
CBDF
Securitisation Regulation
Investment Firms Prudential Review
ESAs
